Literature.Title: Novel Arginine End-Tagging Antimicrobial Peptides to Combat Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Zhang L, Wu Y, Wei N, Yang F, Wang M, Fei C, Liu Y, Xue F, Gu F

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:100% Killing=64 µM,Vero cells:95% Killing=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus SH230(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8099(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli XJ16-1(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4-8µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 8014(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0385(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0911(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.9201(MIC=>64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(90-100% Killing=32µM)
